23V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE constexpr Tagged<Smi>
24 SharedFunctionInfo::kNoSharedNameSentinel;
25
26uint32_t SharedFunctionInfo::Hash() {
27 // Hash SharedFunctionInfo based on its start position and script id. Note: we
28 // don't use the function's literal id since getting that is slow for compiled
29 // functions.
30 int start_pos = StartPosition();
31 int script_id = IsScript(script()) ? Script::cast(script())->id() : 0;
32 return static_cast<uint32_t>(base::hash_combine(start_pos, script_id));
33}
34
35void SharedFunctionInfo::Init(ReadOnlyRoots ro_roots, int unique_id) {
36 DisallowGarbageCollection no_gc;
37
38 // Set the function data to the "illegal" builtin. Ideally we'd use some sort
39 // of "uninitialized" marker here, but it's cheaper to use a valid buitin and
40 // avoid having to do uninitialized checks elsewhere.
41 set_builtin_id(Builtin::kIllegal);
42
43 // Set the name to the no-name sentinel, this can be updated later.
44 set_name_or_scope_info(SharedFunctionInfo::kNoSharedNameSentinel,
45 kReleaseStore, SKIP_WRITE_BARRIER);
46
47 // Generally functions won't have feedback, unless they have been created
48 // from a FunctionLiteral. Those can just reset this field to keep the
49 // SharedFunctionInfo in a consistent state.
50 set_raw_outer_scope_info_or_feedback_metadata(ro_roots.the_hole_value(),
51 SKIP_WRITE_BARRIER);
52 set_script(ro_roots.undefined_value(), kReleaseStore, SKIP_WRITE_BARRIER);
53 set_function_literal_id(kFunctionLiteralIdInvalid);
54 set_unique_id(unique_id);
55
56 // Set integer fields (smi or int, depending on the architecture).
57 set_length(0);
58 set_internal_formal_parameter_count(JSParameterCount(0));
59 set_expected_nof_properties(0);
60 set_raw_function_token_offset(0);
61
62 // All flags default to false or 0, except ConstructAsBuiltinBit just because
63 // we're using the kIllegal builtin.
64 set_flags(ConstructAsBuiltinBit::encode(true), kRelaxedStore);
65 set_flags2(0);
66
67 UpdateFunctionMapIndex();
68
69 set_age(0);
70
71 clear_padding();
72}
73
74Tagged<Code> SharedFunctionInfo::GetCode(Isolate* isolate) const {
75 // ======
76 // NOTE: This chain of checks MUST be kept in sync with the equivalent CSA
77 // GetSharedFunctionInfoCode method in code-stub-assembler.cc.
78 // ======
79
80 Tagged<Object> data = GetData(isolate);
81 if (IsSmi(data)) {
82 // Holding a Smi means we are a builtin.
83 DCHECK(HasBuiltinId());
84 return isolate->builtins()->code(builtin_id());
85 }
86 if (IsBytecodeArray(data)) {
87 // Having a bytecode array means we are a compiled, interpreted function.
88 DCHECK(HasBytecodeArray());
89 return isolate->builtins()->code(Builtin::kInterpreterEntryTrampoline);
90 }
91 if (IsCode(data)) {
92 // Having baseline Code means we are a compiled, baseline function.
93 DCHECK(HasBaselineCode());
94 return Code::cast(data);
95 }
96#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
97 if (IsAsmWasmData(data)) {
98 // Having AsmWasmData means we are an asm.js/wasm function.
99 DCHECK(HasAsmWasmData());
100 return isolate->builtins()->code(Builtin::kInstantiateAsmJs);
101 }
102 if (IsWasmExportedFunctionData(data)) {
103 // Having a WasmExportedFunctionData means the code is in there.
104 DCHECK(HasWasmExportedFunctionData());
105 return wasm_exported_function_data()->wrapper_code(isolate);
106 }
107 if (IsWasmJSFunctionData(data)) {
108 return wasm_js_function_data()->wrapper_code(isolate);
109 }
110 if (IsWasmCapiFunctionData(data)) {
111 return wasm_capi_function_data()->wrapper_code(isolate);
112 }
113 if (IsWasmResumeData(data)) {
114 if (static_cast<wasm::OnResume>(wasm_resume_data()->on_resume()) ==
115 wasm::OnResume::kContinue) {
116 return isolate->builtins()->code(Builtin::kWasmResume);
117 } else {
118 return isolate->builtins()->code(Builtin::kWasmReject);
119 }
120 }
121#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
122 if (IsUncompiledData(data)) {
123 // Having uncompiled data (with or without scope) means we need to compile.
124 DCHECK(HasUncompiledData());
125 return isolate->builtins()->code(Builtin::kCompileLazy);
126 }
127 if (IsFunctionTemplateInfo(data)) {
128 // Having a function template info means we are an API function.
129 DCHECK(IsApiFunction());
130 return isolate->builtins()->code(Builtin::kHandleApiCallOrConstruct);
131 }
132 if (IsInterpreterData(data)) {
133 Tagged<Code> code = InterpreterTrampoline(isolate);
134 DCHECK(IsCode(code));
135 DCHECK(code->is_interpreter_trampoline_builtin());
136 return code;
137 }
138 UNREACHABLE();
139}
140
141SharedFunctionInfo::ScriptIterator::ScriptIterator(Isolate* isolate,
142 Tagged<Script> script)
143 : ScriptIterator(handle(script->shared_function_infos(), isolate)) {}
144
145SharedFunctionInfo::ScriptIterator::ScriptIterator(
146 Handle<WeakFixedArray> shared_function_infos)
147 : shared_function_infos_(shared_function_infos), index_(0) {}
148
149Tagged<SharedFunctionInfo> SharedFunctionInfo::ScriptIterator::Next() {
150 while (index_ < shared_function_infos_->length()) {
151 Tagged<MaybeObject> raw = shared_function_infos_->get(index_++);
152 Tagged<HeapObject> heap_object;
153 if (!raw.GetHeapObject(&heap_object) || IsUndefined(heap_object)) {
154 continue;
155 }
156 return SharedFunctionInfo::cast(heap_object);
157 }
158 return SharedFunctionInfo();
159}
160
161void SharedFunctionInfo::ScriptIterator::Reset(Isolate* isolate,
162 Tagged<Script> script) {
163 shared_function_infos_ = handle(script->shared_function_infos(), isolate);
164 index_ = 0;
165}
166
167void SharedFunctionInfo::SetScript(ReadOnlyRoots roots,
168 Tagged<HeapObject> script_object,
169 int function_literal_id,
170 bool reset_preparsed_scope_data) {
171 DisallowGarbageCollection no_gc;
172
173 if (script() == script_object) return;
174
175 if (reset_preparsed_scope_data && HasUncompiledDataWithPreparseData()) {
176 ClearPreparseData();
177 }
178
179 // Add shared function info to new script's list. If a collection occurs,
180 // the shared function info may be temporarily in two lists.
181 // This is okay because the gc-time processing of these lists can tolerate
182 // duplicates.
183 if (IsScript(script_object)) {
184 DCHECK(!IsScript(script()));
185 Tagged<Script> script = Script::cast(script_object);
186 Tagged<WeakFixedArray> list = script->shared_function_infos();
187#ifdef DEBUG
188 DCHECK_LT(function_literal_id, list->length());
189 Tagged<MaybeObject> maybe_object = list->get(function_literal_id);
190 Tagged<HeapObject> heap_object;
191 if (maybe_object.GetHeapObjectIfWeak(&heap_object)) {
192 DCHECK_EQ(heap_object, *this);
193 }
194#endif
195 list->set(function_literal_id, MakeWeak(Tagged(*this)));
196 } else {
197 DCHECK(IsScript(script()));
198
199 // Remove shared function info from old script's list.
200 Tagged<Script> old_script = Script::cast(script());
201
202 // Due to liveedit, it might happen that the old_script doesn't know
203 // about the SharedFunctionInfo, so we have to guard against that.
204 Tagged<WeakFixedArray> infos = old_script->shared_function_infos();
205 if (function_literal_id < infos->length()) {
206 Tagged<MaybeObject> raw =
207 old_script->shared_function_infos()->get(function_literal_id);
208 Tagged<HeapObject> heap_object;
209 if (raw.GetHeapObjectIfWeak(&heap_object) && heap_object == *this) {
210 old_script->shared_function_infos()->set(function_literal_id,
211 roots.undefined_value());
212 }
213 }
214 }
215
216 // Finally set new script.
217 set_script(script_object, kReleaseStore);
218}
219
220void SharedFunctionInfo::CopyFrom(Tagged<SharedFunctionInfo> other,
221 IsolateForSandbox isolate) {
222 PtrComprCageBase cage_base = GetPtrComprCageBase(*this);
223#ifdef V8_ENABLE_SANDBOX
224 if (other->has_trusted_function_data()) {
225 set_trusted_function_data(
226 other->trusted_function_data(isolate, kAcquireLoad), kReleaseStore);
227 } else {
228 clear_trusted_function_data(kReleaseStore);
229 }
230#endif
231 set_function_data(other->function_data(cage_base, kAcquireLoad),
232 kReleaseStore);
233 set_name_or_scope_info(other->name_or_scope_info(cage_base, kAcquireLoad),
234 kReleaseStore);
235 set_outer_scope_info_or_feedback_metadata(
236 other->outer_scope_info_or_feedback_metadata(cage_base));
237 set_script(other->script(cage_base, kAcquireLoad), kReleaseStore);
238
239 set_length(other->length());
240 set_formal_parameter_count(other->formal_parameter_count());
241 set_function_token_offset(other->function_token_offset());
242 set_expected_nof_properties(other->expected_nof_properties());
243 set_flags2(other->flags2());
244 set_flags(other->flags(kRelaxedLoad), kRelaxedStore);
245 set_function_literal_id(other->function_literal_id());
246 set_unique_id(other->unique_id());
247 set_age(0);
248
249#if DEBUG
250 // This should now be byte-for-byte identical to the input except for the age
251 // field (could be reset concurrently). Compare content before age field now:
252 DCHECK_EQ(memcmp(reinterpret_cast<void*>(address()),
253 reinterpret_cast<void*>(other.address()),
254 SharedFunctionInfo::kAgeOffset),
255 0);
256 // Compare content after age field.
257 constexpr Address kPastAgeOffset =
258 SharedFunctionInfo::kAgeOffset + SharedFunctionInfo::kAgeSize;
259 DCHECK_EQ(memcmp(reinterpret_cast<void*>(address() + kPastAgeOffset),
260 reinterpret_cast<void*>(other.address() + kPastAgeOffset),
261 SharedFunctionInfo::kSize - kPastAgeOffset),
262 0);
263#endif
264}
265
266bool SharedFunctionInfo::HasDebugInfo(Isolate* isolate) const {
267 return isolate->debug()->HasDebugInfo(*this);
268}
269
270Tagged<DebugInfo> SharedFunctionInfo::GetDebugInfo(Isolate* isolate) const {
271 return isolate->debug()->TryGetDebugInfo(*this).value();
272}
273
274base::Optional<Tagged<DebugInfo>> SharedFunctionInfo::TryGetDebugInfo(
275 Isolate* isolate) const {
276 return isolate->debug()->TryGetDebugInfo(*this);
277}
278
279bool SharedFunctionInfo::HasBreakInfo(Isolate* isolate) const {
280 return isolate->debug()->HasBreakInfo(*this);
281}
282
283bool SharedFunctionInfo::BreakAtEntry(Isolate* isolate) const {
284 return isolate->debug()->BreakAtEntry(*this);
285}
286
287bool SharedFunctionInfo::HasCoverageInfo(Isolate* isolate) const {
288 return isolate->debug()->HasCoverageInfo(*this);
289}
290
291Tagged<CoverageInfo> SharedFunctionInfo::GetCoverageInfo(
292 Isolate* isolate) const {
293 DCHECK(HasCoverageInfo(isolate));
294 return CoverageInfo::cast(GetDebugInfo(isolate)->coverage_info());
295}
296
297std::unique_ptr<char[]> SharedFunctionInfo::DebugNameCStr() const {
298#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
299 if (HasWasmExportedFunctionData()) {
300 return WasmExportedFunction::GetDebugName(
301 wasm_exported_function_data()->sig());
302 }
303#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
304 DisallowGarbageCollection no_gc;
305 Tagged<String> function_name = Name();
306 if (function_name->length() == 0) function_name = inferred_name();
307 return function_name->ToCString();
308}
309
310// static
311Handle<String> SharedFunctionInfo::DebugName(
312 Isolate* isolate, Handle<SharedFunctionInfo> shared) {
313#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
314 if (shared->HasWasmExportedFunctionData()) {
315 return isolate->factory()
316 ->NewStringFromUtf8(base::CStrVector(shared->DebugNameCStr().get()))
317 .ToHandleChecked();
318 }
319#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
320 FunctionKind function_kind = shared->kind();
321 if (IsClassMembersInitializerFunction(function_kind)) {
322 return function_kind == FunctionKind::kClassMembersInitializerFunction
323 ? isolate->factory()->instance_members_initializer_string()
324 : isolate->factory()->static_initializer_string();
325 }
326 DisallowHeapAllocation no_gc;
327 Tagged<String> function_name = shared->Name();
328 if (function_name->length() == 0) function_name = shared->inferred_name();
329 return handle(function_name, isolate);
330}
331
332bool SharedFunctionInfo::PassesFilter(const char* raw_filter) {
333 // Filters are almost always "*", so check for that and exit quickly.
334 if (V8_LIKELY(raw_filter[0] == '*' && raw_filter[1] == '\0')) {
335 return true;
336 }
337 base::Vector<const char> filter = base::CStrVector(raw_filter);
338 return v8::internal::PassesFilter(base::CStrVector(DebugNameCStr().get()),
339 filter);
340}
341
342bool SharedFunctionInfo::HasSourceCode() const {
343 ReadOnlyRoots roots = GetReadOnlyRoots();
344 return !IsUndefined(script(), roots) &&
345 !IsUndefined(Script::cast(script())->source(), roots) &&
346 String::cast(Script::cast(script())->source())->length() > 0;
347}
348
349void SharedFunctionInfo::DiscardCompiledMetadata(
350 Isolate* isolate,
351 std::function<void(Tagged<HeapObject> object, ObjectSlot slot,
352 Tagged<HeapObject> target)>
353 gc_notify_updated_slot) {
354 DisallowGarbageCollection no_gc;
355 if (HasFeedbackMetadata()) {
356 if (v8_flags.trace_flush_code) {
357 CodeTracer::Scope scope(isolate->GetCodeTracer());
358 PrintF(scope.file(), "[discarding compiled metadata for ");
359 ShortPrint(*this, scope.file());
360 PrintF(scope.file(), "]\n");
361 }
362
363 Tagged<HeapObject> outer_scope_info;
364 if (scope_info()->HasOuterScopeInfo()) {
365 outer_scope_info = scope_info()->OuterScopeInfo();
366 } else {
367 outer_scope_info = ReadOnlyRoots(isolate).the_hole_value();
368 }
369
370 // Raw setter to avoid validity checks, since we're performing the unusual
371 // task of decompiling.
372 set_raw_outer_scope_info_or_feedback_metadata(outer_scope_info);
373 gc_notify_updated_slot(
374 *this,
375 RawField(SharedFunctionInfo::kOuterScopeInfoOrFeedbackMetadataOffset),
376 outer_scope_info);
377 } else {
378 DCHECK(IsScopeInfo(outer_scope_info()) || IsTheHole(outer_scope_info()));
379 }
380
381 // TODO(rmcilroy): Possibly discard ScopeInfo here as well.
382}
383
384// static
385void SharedFunctionInfo::DiscardCompiled(
386 Isolate* isolate, Handle<SharedFunctionInfo> shared_info) {
387 DCHECK(shared_info->CanDiscardCompiled());
388
389 Handle<String> inferred_name_val =
390 handle(shared_info->inferred_name(), isolate);
391 int start_position = shared_info->StartPosition();
392 int end_position = shared_info->EndPosition();
393
394 MaybeHandle<UncompiledData> data;
395 if (!shared_info->HasUncompiledDataWithPreparseData()) {
396 // Create a new UncompiledData, without pre-parsed scope.
397 data = isolate->factory()->NewUncompiledDataWithoutPreparseData(
398 inferred_name_val, start_position, end_position);
399 }
400
401 // If the GC runs after changing one but not both fields below, it could see
402 // the SharedFunctionInfo in an unexpected state.
403 DisallowGarbageCollection no_gc;
404
405 shared_info->DiscardCompiledMetadata(isolate);
406
407 // Replace compiled data with a new UncompiledData object.
408 if (shared_info->HasUncompiledDataWithPreparseData()) {
409 // If this is uncompiled data with a pre-parsed scope data, we can just
410 // clear out the scope data and keep the uncompiled data.
411 shared_info->ClearPreparseData();
412 DCHECK(data.is_null());
413 } else {
414 // Update the function data to point to the UncompiledData without preparse
415 // data created above. Use the raw function data setter to avoid validity
416 // checks, since we're performing the unusual task of decompiling.
417 shared_info->SetData(*data.ToHandleChecked(), kReleaseStore);
418 }
419}
420
421// static
422Handle<Object> SharedFunctionInfo::GetSourceCode(
423 Isolate* isolate, Handle<SharedFunctionInfo> shared) {
424 if (!shared->HasSourceCode()) return isolate->factory()->undefined_value();
425 Handle<String> source(String::cast(Script::cast(shared->script())->source()),
426 isolate);
427 return isolate->factory()->NewSubString(source, shared->StartPosition(),
428 shared->EndPosition());
429}
430
431// static
432Handle<Object> SharedFunctionInfo::GetSourceCodeHarmony(
433 Isolate* isolate, Handle<SharedFunctionInfo> shared) {
434 if (!shared->HasSourceCode()) return isolate->factory()->undefined_value();
435 Handle<String> script_source(
436 String::cast(Script::cast(shared->script())->source()), isolate);
437 int start_pos = shared->function_token_position();
438 DCHECK_NE(start_pos, kNoSourcePosition);
439 Handle<String> source = isolate->factory()->NewSubString(
440 script_source, start_pos, shared->EndPosition());
441 if (!shared->is_wrapped()) return source;
442
443 DCHECK(!shared->name_should_print_as_anonymous());
444 IncrementalStringBuilder builder(isolate);
445 builder.AppendCStringLiteral("function ");
446 builder.AppendString(Handle<String>(shared->Name(), isolate));
447 builder.AppendCharacter('(');
448 Handle<FixedArray> args(Script::cast(shared->script())->wrapped_arguments(),
449 isolate);
450 int argc = args->length();
451 for (int i = 0; i < argc; i++) {
452 if (i > 0) builder.AppendCStringLiteral(", ");
453 builder.AppendString(Handle<String>(String::cast(args->get(i)), isolate));
454 }
455 builder.AppendCStringLiteral(") {\n");
456 builder.AppendString(source);
457 builder.AppendCStringLiteral("\n}");
458 return indirect_handle(builder.Finish().ToHandleChecked(), isolate);
459}
460
461int SharedFunctionInfo::SourceSize() { return EndPosition() - StartPosition(); }
462
463// Output the source code without any allocation in the heap.
464std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const SourceCodeOf& v) {
465 const Tagged<SharedFunctionInfo> s = v.value;
466 // For some native functions there is no source.
467 if (!s->HasSourceCode()) return os << "<No Source>";
468
469 // Get the source for the script which this function came from.
470 // Don't use String::cast because we don't want more assertion errors while
471 // we are already creating a stack dump.
472 Tagged<String> script_source =
473 String::unchecked_cast(Script::cast(s->script())->source());
474
475 if (!script_source->LooksValid()) return os << "<Invalid Source>";
476
477 if (!s->is_toplevel()) {
478 os << "function ";
479 Tagged<String> name = s->Name();
480 if (name->length() > 0) {
481 name->PrintUC16(os);
482 }
483 }
484
485 int len = s->EndPosition() - s->StartPosition();
486 if (len <= v.max_length || v.max_length < 0) {
487 script_source->PrintUC16(os, s->StartPosition(), s->EndPosition());
488 return os;
489 } else {
490 script_source->PrintUC16(os, s->StartPosition(),
491 s->StartPosition() + v.max_length);
492 return os << "...\n";
493 }
494}
495
496void SharedFunctionInfo::DisableOptimization(Isolate* isolate,
497 BailoutReason reason) {
498 DCHECK_NE(reason, BailoutReason::kNoReason);
499
500 set_flags(DisabledOptimizationReasonBits::update(flags(kRelaxedLoad), reason),
501 kRelaxedStore);
502 // Code should be the lazy compilation stub or else interpreted.
503 if constexpr (DEBUG_BOOL) {
504 CodeKind kind = abstract_code(isolate)->kind(isolate);
505 CHECK(kind == CodeKind::INTERPRETED_FUNCTION || kind == CodeKind::BUILTIN);
506 }
507 PROFILE(isolate, CodeDisableOptEvent(handle(abstract_code(isolate), isolate),
508 handle(*this, isolate)));
509 if (v8_flags.trace_opt) {
510 CodeTracer::Scope scope(isolate->GetCodeTracer());
511 PrintF(scope.file(), "[disabled optimization for ");
512 ShortPrint(*this, scope.file());
513 PrintF(scope.file(), ", reason: %s]\n", GetBailoutReason(reason));
514 }
515}
516
517// static
518template <typename IsolateT>
519void SharedFunctionInfo::InitFromFunctionLiteral(
520 IsolateT* isolate, Handle<SharedFunctionInfo> shared_info,
521 FunctionLiteral* lit, bool is_toplevel) {
522 DCHECK(!IsScopeInfo(shared_info->name_or_scope_info(kAcquireLoad)));
523 {
524 DisallowGarbageCollection no_gc;
525 Tagged<SharedFunctionInfo> raw_sfi = *shared_info;
526 // When adding fields here, make sure DeclarationScope::AnalyzePartially is
527 // updated accordingly.
528 raw_sfi->set_internal_formal_parameter_count(
529 JSParameterCount(lit->parameter_count()));
530 raw_sfi->SetFunctionTokenPosition(lit->function_token_position(),
531 lit->start_position());
532 raw_sfi->set_syntax_kind(lit->syntax_kind());
533 raw_sfi->set_allows_lazy_compilation(lit->AllowsLazyCompilation());
534 raw_sfi->set_language_mode(lit->language_mode());
535 raw_sfi->set_function_literal_id(lit->function_literal_id());
536 // FunctionKind must have already been set.
537 DCHECK(lit->kind() == raw_sfi->kind());
538 DCHECK_IMPLIES(lit->requires_instance_members_initializer(),
539 IsClassConstructor(lit->kind()));
540 raw_sfi->set_requires_instance_members_initializer(
541 lit->requires_instance_members_initializer());
542 DCHECK_IMPLIES(lit->class_scope_has_private_brand(),
543 IsClassConstructor(lit->kind()));
544 raw_sfi->set_class_scope_has_private_brand(
545 lit->class_scope_has_private_brand());
546 DCHECK_IMPLIES(lit->has_static_private_methods_or_accessors(),
547 IsClassConstructor(lit->kind()));
548 raw_sfi->set_has_static_private_methods_or_accessors(
549 lit->has_static_private_methods_or_accessors());
550
551 raw_sfi->set_is_toplevel(is_toplevel);
552 DCHECK(IsTheHole(raw_sfi->outer_scope_info()));
553 if (!is_toplevel) {
554 Scope* outer_scope = lit->scope()->GetOuterScopeWithContext();
555 if (outer_scope) {
556 raw_sfi->set_outer_scope_info(*outer_scope->scope_info());
557 raw_sfi->set_private_name_lookup_skips_outer_class(
558 lit->scope()->private_name_lookup_skips_outer_class());
559 }
560 }
561
562 raw_sfi->set_length(lit->function_length());
563
564 // For lazy parsed functions, the following flags will be inaccurate since
565 // we don't have the information yet. They're set later in
566 // UpdateSharedFunctionFlagsAfterCompilation (compiler.cc), when the
567 // function is really parsed and compiled.
568 if (lit->ShouldEagerCompile()) {
569 raw_sfi->set_has_duplicate_parameters(lit->has_duplicate_parameters());
570 raw_sfi->UpdateAndFinalizeExpectedNofPropertiesFromEstimate(lit);
571 DCHECK_NULL(lit->produced_preparse_data());
572
573 // If we're about to eager compile, we'll have the function literal
574 // available, so there's no need to wastefully allocate an uncompiled
575 // data.
576 return;
577 }
578
579 raw_sfi->UpdateExpectedNofPropertiesFromEstimate(lit);
580 }
581 CreateAndSetUncompiledData(isolate, shared_info, lit);
582}
583
584template <typename IsolateT>
585void SharedFunctionInfo::CreateAndSetUncompiledData(
586 IsolateT* isolate, Handle<SharedFunctionInfo> shared_info,
587 FunctionLiteral* lit) {
588 DCHECK(!shared_info->HasUncompiledData());
589 Handle<UncompiledData> data;
590 ProducedPreparseData* scope_data = lit->produced_preparse_data();
591 if (scope_data != nullptr) {
592 Handle<PreparseData> preparse_data = scope_data->Serialize(isolate);
593
594 if (lit->should_parallel_compile()) {
595 data = isolate->factory()->NewUncompiledDataWithPreparseDataAndJob(
596 lit->GetInferredName(isolate), lit->start_position(),
597 lit->end_position(), preparse_data);
598 } else {
599 data = isolate->factory()->NewUncompiledDataWithPreparseData(
600 lit->GetInferredName(isolate), lit->start_position(),
601 lit->end_position(), preparse_data);
602 }
603 } else {
604 if (lit->should_parallel_compile()) {
605 data = isolate->factory()->NewUncompiledDataWithoutPreparseDataWithJob(
606 lit->GetInferredName(isolate), lit->start_position(),
607 lit->end_position());
608 } else {
609 data = isolate->factory()->NewUncompiledDataWithoutPreparseData(
610 lit->GetInferredName(isolate), lit->start_position(),
611 lit->end_position());
612 }
613 }
614
615 shared_info->set_uncompiled_data(*data);
616}
617
618template EXPORT_TEMPLATE_DEFINE(V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE) void SharedFunctionInfo::
619 InitFromFunctionLiteral<Isolate>(Isolate* isolate,
620 Handle<SharedFunctionInfo> shared_info,
621 FunctionLiteral* lit, bool is_toplevel);
622template EXPORT_TEMPLATE_DEFINE(V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE) void SharedFunctionInfo::
623 InitFromFunctionLiteral<LocalIsolate>(
624 LocalIsolate* isolate, Handle<SharedFunctionInfo> shared_info,
625 FunctionLiteral* lit, bool is_toplevel);
626
627template EXPORT_TEMPLATE_DEFINE(V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE) void SharedFunctionInfo::
628 CreateAndSetUncompiledData<Isolate>(Isolate* isolate,
629 Handle<SharedFunctionInfo> shared_info,
630 FunctionLiteral* lit);
631template EXPORT_TEMPLATE_DEFINE(V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE) void SharedFunctionInfo::
632 CreateAndSetUncompiledData<LocalIsolate>(
633 LocalIsolate* isolate, Handle<SharedFunctionInfo> shared_info,
634 FunctionLiteral* lit);
635
636uint16_t SharedFunctionInfo::get_property_estimate_from_literal(
637 FunctionLiteral* literal) {
638 int estimate = literal->expected_property_count();
639
640 // If this is a class constructor, we may have already parsed fields.
641 if (is_class_constructor()) {
642 estimate += expected_nof_properties();
643 }
644 return estimate;
645}
646
647void SharedFunctionInfo::UpdateExpectedNofPropertiesFromEstimate(
648 FunctionLiteral* literal) {
649 // Limit actual estimate to fit in a 8 bit field, we will never allocate
650 // more than this in any case.
651 static_assert(JSObject::kMaxInObjectProperties <= kMaxUInt8);
652 int estimate = get_property_estimate_from_literal(literal);
653 set_expected_nof_properties(std::min(estimate, kMaxUInt8));
654}
655
656void SharedFunctionInfo::UpdateAndFinalizeExpectedNofPropertiesFromEstimate(
657 FunctionLiteral* literal) {
658 DCHECK(literal->ShouldEagerCompile());
659 if (are_properties_final()) {
660 return;
661 }
662 int estimate = get_property_estimate_from_literal(literal);
663
664 // If no properties are added in the constructor, they are more likely
665 // to be added later.
666 if (estimate == 0) estimate = 2;
667
668 // Limit actual estimate to fit in a 8 bit field, we will never allocate
669 // more than this in any case.
670 static_assert(JSObject::kMaxInObjectProperties <= kMaxUInt8);
671 estimate = std::min(estimate, kMaxUInt8);
672
673 set_expected_nof_properties(estimate);
674 set_are_properties_final(true);
675}
676
677void SharedFunctionInfo::SetFunctionTokenPosition(int function_token_position,
678 int start_position) {
679 int offset;
680 if (function_token_position == kNoSourcePosition) {
681 offset = 0;
682 } else {
683 offset = start_position - function_token_position;
684 }
685
686 if (offset > kMaximumFunctionTokenOffset) {
687 offset = kFunctionTokenOutOfRange;
688 }
689 set_raw_function_token_offset(offset);
690}
691
692int SharedFunctionInfo::StartPosition() const {
693 Tagged<Object> maybe_scope_info = name_or_scope_info(kAcquireLoad);
694 if (IsScopeInfo(maybe_scope_info)) {
695 Tagged<ScopeInfo> info = ScopeInfo::cast(maybe_scope_info);
696 if (info->HasPositionInfo()) {
697 return info->StartPosition();
698 }
699 }
700 if (HasUncompiledData()) {
701 // Works with or without scope.
702 return uncompiled_data()->start_position();
703 }
704 if (IsApiFunction() || HasBuiltinId()) {
705 DCHECK_IMPLIES(HasBuiltinId(), builtin_id() != Builtin::kCompileLazy);
706 return 0;
707 }
708#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
709 if (HasWasmExportedFunctionData()) {
710 Tagged<WasmInstanceObject> instance =
711 wasm_exported_function_data()->instance();
712 int func_index = wasm_exported_function_data()->function_index();
713 auto& function = instance->module()->functions[func_index];
714 return static_cast<int>(function.code.offset());
715 }
716#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
717 return kNoSourcePosition;
718}
719
720int SharedFunctionInfo::EndPosition() const {
721 Tagged<Object> maybe_scope_info = name_or_scope_info(kAcquireLoad);
722 if (IsScopeInfo(maybe_scope_info)) {
723 Tagged<ScopeInfo> info = ScopeInfo::cast(maybe_scope_info);
724 if (info->HasPositionInfo()) {
725 return info->EndPosition();
726 }
727 }
728 if (HasUncompiledData()) {
729 // Works with or without scope.
730 return uncompiled_data()->end_position();
731 }
732 if (IsApiFunction() || HasBuiltinId()) {
733 DCHECK_IMPLIES(HasBuiltinId(), builtin_id() != Builtin::kCompileLazy);
734 return 0;
735 }
736#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
737 if (HasWasmExportedFunctionData()) {
738 Tagged<WasmInstanceObject> instance =
739 wasm_exported_function_data()->instance();
740 int func_index = wasm_exported_function_data()->function_index();
741 auto& function = instance->module()->functions[func_index];
742 return static_cast<int>(function.code.end_offset());
743 }
744#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
745 return kNoSourcePosition;
746}
747
748void SharedFunctionInfo::UpdateFromFunctionLiteralForLiveEdit(
749 FunctionLiteral* lit) {
750 Tagged<Object> maybe_scope_info = name_or_scope_info(kAcquireLoad);
751 if (IsScopeInfo(maybe_scope_info)) {
752 // Updating the ScopeInfo is safe since they are identical modulo
753 // source positions.
754 Tagged<ScopeInfo> new_scope_info = *lit->scope()->scope_info();
755 DCHECK(new_scope_info->Equals(ScopeInfo::cast(maybe_scope_info), true));
756 SetScopeInfo(new_scope_info);
757 } else if (!is_compiled()) {
758 CHECK(HasUncompiledData());
759 if (HasUncompiledDataWithPreparseData()) {
760 ClearPreparseData();
761 }
762 uncompiled_data()->set_start_position(lit->start_position());
763 uncompiled_data()->set_end_position(lit->end_position());
764
765 if (!is_toplevel()) {
766 Scope* outer_scope = lit->scope()->GetOuterScopeWithContext();
767 if (outer_scope) {
768 // Use the raw accessor since we have to replace the existing outer
769 // scope.
770 set_raw_outer_scope_info_or_feedback_metadata(
771 *outer_scope->scope_info());
772 }
773 }
774 }
775 SetFunctionTokenPosition(lit->function_token_position(),
776 lit->start_position());
777}
778
779CachedTieringDecision SharedFunctionInfo::cached_tiering_decision() {
780 return CachedTieringDecisionBits::decode(flags2());
781}
782
783void SharedFunctionInfo::set_cached_tiering_decision(
784 CachedTieringDecision decision) {
785 set_flags2(CachedTieringDecisionBits::update(flags2(), decision));
786}
787
788// static
789void SharedFunctionInfo::EnsureBytecodeArrayAvailable(
790 Isolate* isolate, Handle<SharedFunctionInfo> shared_info,
791 IsCompiledScope* is_compiled_scope, CreateSourcePositions flag) {
792 if (!shared_info->HasBytecodeArray()) {
793 if (!Compiler::Compile(isolate, shared_info, Compiler::CLEAR_EXCEPTION,
794 is_compiled_scope, flag)) {
795 FATAL("Failed to compile shared info that was already compiled before");
796 }
797 DCHECK(shared_info->GetBytecodeArray(isolate)->HasSourcePositionTable());
798 } else {
799 *is_compiled_scope = shared_info->is_compiled_scope(isolate);
800 }
801}
802
803// static
804void SharedFunctionInfo::EnsureSourcePositionsAvailable(
805 Isolate* isolate, Handle<SharedFunctionInfo> shared_info) {
806 if (shared_info->CanCollectSourcePosition(isolate)) {
807 base::Optional<Isolate::ExceptionScope> exception_scope;
808 if (isolate->has_exception()) {
809 exception_scope.emplace(isolate);
810 }
811 Compiler::CollectSourcePositions(isolate, shared_info);
812 }
813}
814
815// static
816void SharedFunctionInfo::InstallDebugBytecode(Handle<SharedFunctionInfo> shared,
817 Isolate* isolate) {
818 DCHECK(shared->HasBytecodeArray());
819 Handle<BytecodeArray> original_bytecode_array(
820 shared->GetBytecodeArray(isolate), isolate);
821 Handle<BytecodeArray> debug_bytecode_array =
822 isolate->factory()->CopyBytecodeArray(original_bytecode_array);
823
824 {
825 DisallowGarbageCollection no_gc;
826 base::SharedMutexGuard<base::kExclusive> mutex_guard(
827 isolate->shared_function_info_access());
828 Tagged<DebugInfo> debug_info = shared->GetDebugInfo(isolate);
829 debug_info->set_original_bytecode_array(*original_bytecode_array,
830 kReleaseStore);
831 debug_info->set_debug_bytecode_array(*debug_bytecode_array, kReleaseStore);
832 shared->SetActiveBytecodeArray(*debug_bytecode_array, isolate);
833 }
834}
835
836// static
837void SharedFunctionInfo::UninstallDebugBytecode(
838 Tagged<SharedFunctionInfo> shared, Isolate* isolate) {
839 DisallowGarbageCollection no_gc;
840 base::SharedMutexGuard<base::kExclusive> mutex_guard(
841 isolate->shared_function_info_access());
842 Tagged<DebugInfo> debug_info = shared->GetDebugInfo(isolate);
843 Tagged<BytecodeArray> original_bytecode_array =
844 debug_info->OriginalBytecodeArray(isolate);
845 DCHECK(!shared->HasBaselineCode());
846 shared->SetActiveBytecodeArray(original_bytecode_array, isolate);
847 debug_info->clear_original_bytecode_array();
848 debug_info->clear_debug_bytecode_array();
849}
850
851// static
852void SharedFunctionInfo::EnsureOldForTesting(Tagged<SharedFunctionInfo> sfi) {
853 if (v8_flags.flush_code_based_on_time ||
854 v8_flags.flush_code_based_on_tab_visibility) {
855 sfi->set_age(kMaxAge);
856 } else {
857 sfi->set_age(v8_flags.bytecode_old_age);
858 }
859}
860
861#ifdef DEBUG
862// static
863bool SharedFunctionInfo::UniqueIdsAreUnique(Isolate* isolate) {
864 std::unordered_set<uint32_t> ids({isolate->next_unique_sfi_id()});
865 CombinedHeapObjectIterator it(isolate->heap());
866 for (Tagged<HeapObject> o = it.Next(); !o.is_null(); o = it.Next()) {
867 if (!IsSharedFunctionInfo(o)) continue;
868 auto result = ids.emplace(SharedFunctionInfo::cast(o)->unique_id());
869 // If previously inserted...
870 if (!result.second) return false;
871 }
872 return true;
873}
874#endif // DEBUG
